name: flatted
description: A super light and fast circular JSON parser.
author: Andrea Giammarchi

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm test && npm run esm && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/index.js; echo 'module.exports = Flatted;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/index.js; echo 'export default Flatted;' >> esm/index.js; echo 'export var parse = Flatted.parse;' >> esm/index.js; echo 'export var stringify = Flatted.stringify;' >> esm/index.js
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) 2018, Andrea Giammarchi, (ISC) */'>min.js && uglifyjs index.js --support-ie8 -c -m >> min.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c
